project_descr: The purpose of this project is to reduce the impact of increasingly intensive wave activity through the compounding effects of sea-level rise and intensifying storm events, that is amplifying coastal erosion..

outputs.output_descr: Strengthened adaptive capacity and reduced exposure to climate risks. Reduce the impact of increasingly intensive wave activity through the compounding effects of sea-level rise and intensifying storm events, that is simplifying coastal and erosion.

document_name: https://info.undp.org/docs/pdc/Documents/TUV/Fully signed Project Document as at 14 Jun 2017.pdf
